description:
This is a market on a year-to-year inflation, as measured by the Eurostat (HICP), from May 2021 to May 2022.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the European Union annual inflation in May 2022 is 8.8 percent or more and "No" otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be the Eurostat, the statistical office of the European Union: https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/products-euro-indicators.

The next release of HICP inflation rate with full data for May 2022 is scheduled for June 17, 2022.

Note, that this market is about inflation for all European Union Member States, not only the Euro zone (states using €).

The Inflation dashboard for the Euro zone can be viewed here: https://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/macroeconomic_and_sectoral/hicp/html/index.en.html

events.title: Will annual inflation in the European Union be 8.8% or more in May?

question: Will annual inflation in the European Union be 8.8% or more in May?
